column1: Art Institute of Chicago////After a year long hiatus
column2: I finally came back to the AI and I can definitely conclude that this has to be one of my favorite places to go. I can geek it up for hours admiring the same pieces over and over again
column3: and it's still fascinates me. There are so many positive reviews for the AI already
column4: I really don't need to add my two cents
column5: but I can and I will. Â Because I love it.
